name: The Pantry
description: A locally loved, independently owned restaurant and café in the heart of Newmarket. Open from breakfast through dinner, The Pantry offers fresh, seasonal dishes, creative cocktails, and themed evenings in a warm and welcoming space. Perfect for post-race dining, family meals, and relaxed nights out.

address.streetAddress: The Guineas Shopping Centre, 74 The Rookery

subjectOf.name: Where to eat after Newmarket Races
subjectOf.description: The Pantry is a popular dining choice for racegoers looking for relaxed post-race meals and drinks near the course.

subjectOf.name: Where to eat out in Newmarket at night
subjectOf.description: With themed evenings, cocktails and seasonal specials, The Pantry offers a fresh alternative for evening dining in Newmarket.
